sentences.sentence: Arthur C. Clarke likes to quote his friend and fellow SF writer Ray Bradbury.
sentences.translation: 阿瑟·C. 克拉克喜欢引用他的朋友兼同事—科幻作家雷·布拉德伯里的话。

sentences.sentence: We don't want to limit your interpretation of SF either.
sentences.translation: 我们也不想限制你对科学小说的翻译。
